SEARCH
Package com.orders.cabinet.repository

Interface ShopRepository

Type Parameters:
Shops - the type of the entity to handle
String - the type of the entity's identifier
All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Shops,String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Shops,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Shops,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Shops,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Shops,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Shops>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Shops,String>
public interface ShopRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Shops,String>
Repository interface for Shops entity.

This interface extends JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations for Shops entities. It leverages Spring Data JPA to generate the necessary implementation at runtime.

Custom queries are defined to perform specific operations such as finding shops by ID, updating passwords, and deleting shops by corp ID.

Since:
2024-07-19

  • Method Details

    • getShopByShopId

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM shops WHERE shop_id = ?1", nativeQuery=true) Optional<Shops> getShopByShopId(String shopId)
      Finds a shop by its ID.
      Parameters:
      shopId - the ID of the shop to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found shop, or Optional.empty() if not found

    • findCorpByShopId

      @Query("SELECT s.corp FROM Shops s WHERE s.shopId = :shopId") Optional<Corp> findCorpByShopId(@Param("shopId") String shopId)
      Finds a shop by its ID.
      Parameters:
      shopId - the ID of the shop to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found shop, or Optional.empty() if not found

    • deleteByCorpId

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM Shops s WHERE s.corp.corpId = :corpId") void deleteByCorpId(String corpId)
      Deletes shops associated with a given corporation ID.

      This method uses a custom query to delete shops based on their associated corporation ID. It is marked with Modifying and Transactional annotations to ensure the operation is executed within a transaction and modifies the database state.

      Parameters:
      corpId - the ID of the corporation whose shops are to be deleted

    • updatePassword

      @Modifying @Query("UPDATE Shops s SET s.password = :password WHERE s.shopId = :shopId") void updatePassword(@Param("shopId") String shopId, @Param("password") String password)
      Updates the password for a shop.
      Parameters:
      shopId - the ID of the shop to update
      password - the new password to set

    • updateLoggedIn

      @Modifying @Query("UPDATE Shops s SET s.logged = :loggedIn WHERE s.shopId = :shopId") void updateLoggedIn(@Param("shopId") String shopId, @Param("loggedIn") Boolean loggedIn)
      Updates the logged-in status for a shop.
      Parameters:
      shopId - the ID of the shop to update
      loggedIn - the new logged-in status to set
